Package Offer

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Offer.Offer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HolidayOffer, LivingOffer

    public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class which implements an offer that has a deposit, start date, house, host, guest a list of comments, and a status.
    Author:
    Javier Delgado del Cerro, Javier Lopez Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Offer

        public Offer(double deposit,
             java.time.LocalDate startDate,
             RegisteredUser host,
             House house)
        Constructor of the Offer class.
        Parameters:
        deposit - double with the money the offer's deposit costs.
        startDate - LocalDate which indicates when the offer starts.
        host - RegisteredUser who creates the offer.
        house - House in which the offer takes place.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(java.time.LocalDate todayDate)
        Method that validates an offer and solves possible problems. In case the offer is reserved since five or more days, but the guest has not paid we mark it as available,or as not available if the offer has already started. An offer is not valid just when more than five days have passes since the administrator asked for changes.
        Parameters:
        todayDate - current date to check if the offer is valid.
        Returns:
        true if it's valid, false otherwise.

      • setStartDate

        public void setStartDate(java.time.LocalDate l)
                  throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Setter of the offer's starting date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
        Parameters:
        l - new offer's starting date.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - If the offer is not waiting to be changed.

      • setDeposit

        public void setDeposit(double d)
                throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Setter of the offer's deposit in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
        Parameters:
        d - double with the new offer's deposit.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - If the offer is not waiting to be changed.

      • setHouse

        public void setHouse(House h)
              throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Setter of the offer's house in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
        Parameters:
        h - new offer's house.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - If the offer is not waiting to be changed.

      • setLastModifiedDate

        protected void setLastModifiedDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Updates the offer's lasModifiedDate, which allows the system to know if more than five days since the changes were asked or since a reservation was made have passed.
        Parameters:
        date - LocalDate when the last modification was made.

      • setWaiting

        protected void setWaiting()
        Protected function used by LivingOffer and HolidayOffer to notify they have made changes on the offer.

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Getter of the user status that shows if it's waiting to be approved, reserved, bought, denied.
        Returns:
        the offer status, which can be: WAITING, TO_CHANGE, DENIED, AVAILABLE, RESERVED, BOUGHT.

      • approveOffer

        public void approveOffer()
                  throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Approve an offer which was waiting to be approved. The offer will be marked as AVAILABLE. If it was already approved, we just exit the function, in order to avoid a silly exception.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - if the offer can't be denied because it is already approved/reserved/bought.

      • denyOffer

        public void denyOffer()
               throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Deny an offer which the administrator consider it is not valid, or because it is not reserved an the host wants to remove it. The offer will be marked as DENIED. If it was already denied, we just exit the function, in order to avoid a silly exception.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - if the offer can't be denied because it is already approved/reserved/bought, or if it is a valid offer.

      • askForChanges

        public void askForChanges(java.lang.String text)
                   throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Ask for changes on an offer in case the Administrator consider it is not valid to be published. The admin writes a comment so that the host knows what to change. Although the Offer was previously on the status TO_CHANGE, the administrator may want to add more comments.
        Parameters:
        text - The comment that the administrator wants to write.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - if the offer can't be changed because it is already approved/reserved/bought/denied.

      • reserveOffer

        public void reserveOffer(RegisteredUser guest)
                  throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Reserve an offer so that it is marked as RESERVED, its Guest is set to guest, and the offer is added to the guest's bought/reserved offers list.
        Parameters:
        guest - The RegisteredUser who wants to reserve the offer.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - in case the offer is not available.

      • buyOffer

        public void buyOffer(RegisteredUser guest,
                     java.lang.String subject)
              throws NotAvailableOfferException,
                     es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.FailedInternetConnectionException,
                     es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException
        Buy an offer so that it is marked as BOUGHT, its Guest is set to guest, and the offer is added to the guest's bought/reserved offers list (in case it was not added before). Pay the guest and the host. If the guest credit card is not valid, he is banned, the offer is marked as available, and he is logged out. If the host credit card is not valid, he is banned and the money is added to his debt money.
        Parameters:
        guest - The RegisteredUser who wants to buy the offer.
        subject - String which describes the bought.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - in case the offer is not available, or if the offer is reserved by a different user than the one who wants to buy it.
        es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.FailedInternetConnectionException - if the subject starts with W or w.
        es.uam.eps.padsof.telecard.OrderRejectedException - if the order was rejected by the payment system.

      • commissions

        public abstract double commissions()
        Return the commissions an offer has.
        Returns:
        double of the offer commissions.

      • calculateRating

        public double calculateRating()
        Calculate the average rating of all the offer's comments.
        Returns:
        double with the average rating.

      • postComment

        public boolean postComment(RegisteredUser user,
                           java.lang.String text)
        Post a TextComment into an offer.
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUsers who wrote the comment.
        text - String to be posted on the comment.
        Returns:
        true.

      • postComment

        public boolean postComment(RegisteredUser user,
                           int rating)
        Post a rating into an offer.
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUsers who rated the offer.
        rating - int from zero to five.
        Returns:
        false if the rating is not an int from zero to five, true otherwise.

      • postComment

        public boolean postComment(RegisteredUser user,
                           java.lang.String text,
                           TextComment answerTo)
        Post an answer to another offer's TextComment.
        Parameters:
        user - RegisteredUsers who wrote the comment answer.
        text - String to be posted on the comment answer.
        answerTo - Comment the user wants to answer to.
        Returns:
        false if the answerTo comment was not in the offer, true otherwise.

      • getPrice

        public abstract double getPrice()
        Abstract function that returns the total price of an offer.
        Returns:
        double with the total price the user needs to pay.

        public RegisteredUser getHost()
        Getter of the offer's host.
        Returns:

        Getter of the offer's guest.
        Returns:

        public House getHouse()
        Getter of the offer's house.
        Returns:
        House of the offer.

      • getDeposit

        public double getDeposit()
        Getter of the offer's deposit the guest needs to pay.
        Returns:
        double with the offer's deposit price.

        Getter of the LocalDate when the offer starts.
        Returns:
        LocalDate with the date the offer starts.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object ob)

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
